matches./tmp/vanessa/spack-stage/spack-stage-tur:

/**
   To use Python compiled packages, you may have to modify Tcl
   to use dlopen(..., RTLD_NOW | RTLD_GLOBAL)
   Cf. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8302810/undefined-symbol-in-c-when-loading-a-python-shared-library
*/

@dispatch=WORKER
(string output) python(string code, string expr="\"\"",
                       boolean exceptions_are_errors=true)
"turbine" "0.1.0"
[ "set <<output>> [ turbine::python 0 <<exceptions_are_errors>> <<code>> <<expr>>  ]" ];

@dispatch=WORKER
(string output) python_persist(string code, string expr="\"\"",
                               boolean exceptions_are_errors=true)
"turbine" "0.1.0"
[ "set <<output>> [ turbine::python 1 <<exceptions_are_errors>> <<code>> <<expr>> ]" ];
